trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around May 27th 2010
divs: sighting detailswatching the spotlight of the new supermarket 6 blocks away, just to see how far the light travelled. full moon, few stars. i was sitting on my porch facing south. at 10 pm, 2200 hours, the spotlights turned off, but stars were still not very visable. i noticed what i thought was a star suddenly appear in the sky, near what i was told by my neighbor is casiopea. it was white and stationary, but suddenly it pulsated red and white. it then began to move in an odd manner. the best way i can describe it is that it fluttered. the way a butterfly flys in an unpredictable pattern. it was very distant and small, the size of a star. it moved east to west, darting about. my companion saw it as well, he also thought it was very odd, but wasn't interested. i got my neighbor, but within 3 minutes time it had disappeared. it then reappeared farther south. i went to get my neighbor again, but he missed it again, as it was gone in 5 minutes or less. i saw the odd craft again, back in it's original position, but this time there was also a blue light. a second craft appeared that flashed only red and white, and they flew parallel east to west for a bit. just a few minutes really and they were gone. again, i saw them in their original location, but this time there was what appeared to be traditional aircraft flying near the odd aircraft. these two plans flew in a straight line, and looked the way i am accustomed to planes. i believe the two new planes to be our own military aircraft, as their flight pattern was predictable, and their lighting did not pulsate or change. in addition, these new aircraft were constantly visible, while the two original aircraft disappeared and reappeared. all four planes flew parallel to each other, until the normal aircraft reached a point in the western sky. at this time the odd "planes" continued to disappear in the west, reappear in the east, and then travel west again. for some time only the "normal" crafts were visible cirlcing in the west. again a single ufo, for lack of a better term, was back, but this time it was northeast. the craft took off very quickly, in a blur, with great speed, and vanished. i was actually very afraid, but very curious at the same time. this activity began at 10, just after the spot lights went out. i went in at 2227, so i don't know how long it actually lasted. my neighbor, an avid ufo person told me he had no doubt i was seeing alien activity. he did not actually see the craft however. just curious if anyone else saw these lights. omaha is very near offut airforce base. actually, i am about 20 miles from the base, as i live on the douglas county\sarpy county line.
Summary: Red, white occasionally blue darting flashing light.
